TopicTitle: KerbNet Access' description on VAB is incomplete

Articles.Content:
Version 1.3.0, Windows 64 bit, Steam.
build id = 01804 2017.05.25

When reading a ship part's details with KerbNet Access, it shows some values but does not say what do they mean.

How should the information be seen on the screenshot below:

  • Minimum FoV: 10º
  • Maximum FoV: 20º
  • Anomaly Detection: 48%
  • Scan Modes
    • Biome
    • Terrain
  • Scans Enhanced While
    • In Atmospheric Flight
    • In Suborbital Spaceflight

Screenshot taken from a newly created sandbox game:

put this up on the kerbal bug tracker if you want to see it fixed (assuming this is in stock)

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/projects/ksp/issues/new
